name.zh_CN: 必应图片 新标签页
name.zh_TW: 必应图片 新標籤頁

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple new tab with beautiful bing.com daily wallpaper.
short.zh_CN: 极简新标签页。每日美图壁纸自动更新。
short.zh_TW: 極簡新標籤頁。每日美圖壁紙自動更新。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Super simple, just install, and accept it to take over the new tab. Then you can see bing wallpaper in new tab. Just enjoy the beautiful.

based on https://codingcat.cn/ataraxia/ .
long.zh_CN,zh_TW:
极简的功能，让new tab呈现优美的bing 图片，让浏览器赏心悦目。

基于 https://codingcat.cn/ataraxia/ 修改。
